DOC.brief_title: Tissue Factor Expression Stage C Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Monocyte tissue factor ( TF ) characterize Class C heart failure ( HF ) vs. 25 age-matched volunteer . TF 2.9 fold high ( p < 0.001 ) HF patient vs. control . HF patient show increased clinical event ( RR=1.29 , p=0.04 ) compare procoagulant activity above/below median . HF associate increase TF expression . Previous study suggest marker coagulation elevate heart failure ( HF ) . Tissue factor ( TF ) play cardinal role initiate coagulation cascade . This study determine TF expression HF association disease progression . Methods : Monocytes obtain 50 NYHA function class II-IV HF patient 25 age-matched disease-free volunteer . TF protein , TF procoagulant activity , tissue factor pathway inhibitor ( TFPI ) determine .
DOC.criteria: Heart failure subject symptomatic heart failure ( New York Heart Association [ NYHA ] functional class II IV ) due either idiopathic dilate cardiomyopathy ischemic cardiomyopathy leave ventricular ejection fraction < 0.35 .
